name: Magician
description: A path focused on arcane magic and spellcasting

skills.name: Powered by Magic
skills.description: When you use Power for a spell, you roll a number of d6s equal to 1 + the level of the spell instead of the normal number of d6s. For example, you roll 2d6 when you cast a level 1 spell. You can never have more than 5 Power.

skills.name: Spellcasting
skills.description: You can cast spells. You learn one spell chosen from your tradition, of a level for which you have a spell slot. You also prepare all other spells available from your tradition.

choices.description: You discover one tradition of magic.

skills.name: Magic Sense
skills.description: You always sense the presence of magic within 1 yard of you.

skills.name: Read Magic
skills.description: You can read text, regardless of the language in which it is written.

choices.description: You discover one tradition of magic.

skills.name: Improved Powered by Magic
skills.description: When you use Power for a spell, you roll a number of d6s equal to 2 + the level of the spell instead of the normal number of d6s. For example, you roll 3d6 when you cast a level 1 spell. You can never have more than 5 Power.
